FuncDef: This command specifies the interval for periodic updates. The minimal interval is 1 hour. The maximum interval is 366 days.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of days for periodic updates. Values-0 to 366.
Specifies the number of hours for periodic updates. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the number of minutes for periodic updates. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the number of seconds for periodic updates. Values-0 to 59.
